content:
FILE_WRITTEN:tools/_scaffold.py
DIR_STATE:["tools/__init__.py", "tools/_scaffold.py", "tools/_schema_loader.py", "tools/_validation.py", "tools/metadata_cli.py", "tools/pipeline.py", "tools/qa_artifacts.py", "tools/qa_gate.py"]
Summary: Wrote a standalone scaffolding module that creates the canonical case-study directory layout and a schema-derived metadata.json template compatible with the single authoritative METADATA_SCHEMA.json.
